name: LLA Workforce Development Program
description: At LLA, students gain real-world work experience through internships and jobs with our various Bay Area employer partners. howToGetIt: To apply for an admissions interview or arrange a site visit, please call 415-397-8957 and ask for Kelly Baker, Executive Assistant. If you or a young person you care about wants to try a different path, please contact us. Same-day or next-day appointments with Teri Delane, Executive Director, are always available. Accepted students often start at Life Learning Academy the day after the interview. Just call.
